189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: Marnix sneers Nils will never make his first collection's fashion show deadline, yet Sara believes Nil's confident assurance. Now Simon has saved the day Sara presumes Ella is her 'rival' for him, but soon learns he only praised her. Alexander fears Britt may make his hit and run public, causing a scandal for him and Présence and robbing their baby of parents for sure. Hans gets a surprise visit from Martine, who claims in tears to be raped by her therapist; he lets her sleep on the couch one night, Lut is furious when she answers the phone.

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: Now Ella's team has arrived to prepare Nils's 'casual' fashion show, Simon overhears Ellen tell Lut she thinks Sara has something with stylist Jakob, who assures Thomas and dad her makeover tapped into her potential. With the sweet taste of success, Michèle tells Lieven Jan wants her to stay longer to help him get some Présence stock; each de Lannoye plainly refuses to sell him their shares, Sara promises to consider an offer on Ecomoda's. Helen makes a silly scene to Steven about him not telling her everything but succumbs to playful kisses.

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Simon proves his devotion to Présence, even doing legwork to find rose petals for Nils's show. Leon, who is impatient to go sailing after his operation, finally agrees to seeing repentant son Simon again after learning about his Danish project, then pleads for Lieven's well-done job to be rewarded. Thomas finally forgives Nils for kissing Jana, and makes up with An himself- passionately kissing. Alexander and Britt stay aloof, emotionally numb.

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: Leon and Simon are relieved they're making up. Encouraging words from Marnix help Nils to get over the jitters which got onto his bowls, yet Hans, Thomas and the other staff models are meticulously prepared for the show. Arne convinces Sara last minute to give an improvised welcome speech, introducing Nils. The show is a hit with the press.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: Since Nils's fashion show was a success, Présence's future looks viable again, but Alexander still intends to break away. Ellen signs the Danish distribution contract, for the whole collection plus the perfume, only Arne messed up a clause in the haste. Sara gratefully tells Simon he's welcome again, but without a board position, while in fact she's still in love with him but untrusting and jealous. Leon has a more urgent and exciting, yet stressing priority: a heart has become available for a transplant operation within hours, the family joins him for moral support, ...

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Thomas and Ann are back on kissing terms, during her lunch break they even get his only pub clients to leave so they can prove sex with love is better then anyone else they had. She tells Jana, who replies she's fallen for Nils. Alexander's lawyer convinces him confession can get him off with a light sentence, provided he shows remorse, and coaches him to cry, then his sister makes up. Leon goes into hospital for his heart surgery, which may take twelve hours, the family waits anxiously. Sara rudely waves Simon's suggestion he or Lieven could help overworked Arne ...

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: Sara realizes she can't sleep with another before things are settled with Simon, then learns Ellen never slept with him but blames Arne for misunderstanding it. Steven proves a devoted groom. Marnix accepts to create another wedding dress after Nils offers to have a go. Now Leon's operation has been a success, he finally forgives Simon. Patrick calls America his past, his Flemish family their future, but Lut convinces Ellen a holiday to the places where he lived in the US is a great idea. Thomas kisses Ann, who promises to tell Nils, who already knows. The sales of ...

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Marnix tries to hide his jealousy of Nils's "beginners luck". While Sara still doubts whether Jacb can be her man without getting over Simon, he gets desperately jealous, and reads her diary. Lieven decides to turn down Michele's offer to stay on a bit longer for publicity, hoping they have a future just as a couple, and prevents Sara catching Simon by taking her to dinner. Britt has a pregnancy crisis and considers going to the police; meanwhile Alexander still hesitated to display remorse while confessing his hit and run to the police, it seems to go well when he ...

197.title: Slotaflevering (final)
197.plot: Simon reads in Sara's diary she also feels their relationship is unique, and insists to see Lieven in the gym as soon as he has brought her back. Patrick convinces Ellen to take a long holiday to visit the American cities he told her about. Jealous Marnix sneers the glowing revue on Nils's collection and 'sexy' person must be written by his "lover" Jana; the youngsters make it come true while Thomas watches smiling, next invites Ann to move in with him while his parents are 'honeymooning' in America. Alexander learns about Britt's miscarriage, she refuses flowers from...

-1.title: Episode dated 30 April 2008
-1.plot: Alexander and Britt decide to meet again 'occasionally' - starting with lunch. Lieven encourages Simon to raise a critical voice about the payment scheme. Michèle arrives, hardly welcomed warmly, after a cynical send-off by Jan, except from Lieven, who tells her its' best not to expect all qualities in one person, and practices what he preaches. Alexander has found a lawyer from another firm, and Présence hopes to counter-sue Sara for fraud now even Simon believes she may have selfishly played him, at least at the end.

imdb.plot outline: Sara is a Flemish soap, on a modest budget, about the people connected to the fashion firm Présence, founded by Leon van Wyck and his late partner but artistically dependent on the gay designer Marnix Standaardt; since Leon retired, his son Simon, the commercial brain, took over as CEO but the other heir, financial director Alexander Delanoye -whose sister Helena is Simon's fiancée, a loveless alliance in his mind- schemes to seize the throne. Sara De Roose is a naive college graduate, who accepted to work under Simon below her qualifications because she is madly in love with him, and gets drawn into the dirty games he plays in business and, partially connected, in his complex and utterly unfaithful love-life, while she tries to help her even naiver father Hans, a nursery laborer. Other characters include Lieven Pauwels, the personnel chief, Britt, the secretary who can't stomach Sara becoming Simon's private assistant, cute runner Thomas and his mother Ellen who hid for him his father Patrick is alive, and his girlfriend Ann.

Other characters include Lieven Pauwels, the personnel chief, Britt, the secretary who can't stomach _Sara_ (qv) becoming Simon's private assistant, cute runner Thomas and his mother Ellen who hid for him his father Patrick is alive, and his girlfriend Ann.::KGF Vissers
